name: PAT_INDICATOR_INFO
description: The PAT_INDICATOR_INFO table contains information about your patient genomic indicator records.

columns.name: PAT_INDICATOR_ID
columns.description: This column contains the unique identifier (.1 item) for the pt indicators record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: This column contains the date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PAT_IND_CSN_ID
columns.description: This column contains the contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: This column contains the EMP ID of the user that has made an update to this PGI record.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENT_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the instant of entry when the genomic indicator record is edited.

columns.name: HIDDEN_FROM_PAT_YN
columns.description: This column contains whether the genomic indicator is hidden from the patient. If null, the default is No.

columns.name: REMOVAL_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the reason why a patient's genomic indicator was marked as "removed" from the patient's genomic indicators list.
